citations.title: Rivian and Volkswagen Group Announce Plans for Joint
citations.summary: Rivian and Volkswagen Group are collaborating to enhance software development, leveraging Rivian's zonal hardware design and integrated technology platform for future software-defined vehicle (SDV) advancements. This partnership aims to combine their strengths, reduce vehicle costs through increased scale, and accelerate global innovation. Rivian, known for its electric vehicles, focuses on facilitating the transition to zero-emission transportation and energy.

citations.title: Rivian Releases First Quarter 2025 Financial Results
citations.summary: Rivian has made significant strides in the development of its R2 electric vehicle, initiating design validation builds on its prototype line with majority production tooling. The company's 1.1 million sq. ft. manufacturing expansion in Normal, Illinois is on schedule, with R2 production expected to commence in the first half of 2026. In the first quarter of 2025, Rivian produced 14,611 vehicles and delivered 8,640, aligning with management's guidance.

citations.title: Rivian Releases Second Quarter 2025 Financial Results
citations.summary: Rivian's preparations for the R2 vehicle launch are on schedule, with the 1.1 million square foot expansion of its Normal, Illinois plant nearly complete and production tooling installation underway. The company plans to commission the new R2 production line in the third quarter of 2025 to validate equipment and processes, while pilot production builds are already being conducted in California. Additionally, Rivian is focusing on its autonomy platform and plans to share more details about its roadmap later this year.

citations.title: Rivian Releases Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2024 ...
citations.summary: Rivian has secured a loan agreement with the U.S. Department of Energy for up to $6.6 billion to support the construction of a new manufacturing facility in Georgia, which is projected to create around 7,500 jobs. This funding, along with Rivian's existing cash resources, will aid in the development of their electric vehicles and associated software, emphasizing their commitment to advancing zero-emission transportation. The company focuses on producing innovative electric vehicles designed for both work and leisure.

citations.title: Rivian Holds Kickoff Ceremony for Georgia Plant, ...
citations.summary: Rivian held a groundbreaking ceremony for its new manufacturing plant in Social Circle, Georgia, which is set to begin construction in 2026 and represents a multi-billion dollar investment. The facility is expected to create 7,500 jobs by 2030, including 2,000 construction jobs, and will focus on producing Rivian's next generation vehicles, specifically the midsize R2 SUV and R3 crossover, with customer vehicle production anticipated to start in 2028.

citations.title: Rivian launches world's first Electric Adventure Vehicles
citations.summary: Rivian's R1T and R1S electric vehicles are built on a skateboard platform that integrates the battery pack, drive units, suspension, braking, and thermal systems below the wheel height, maximizing interior space for passengers and cargo. The vehicles feature a robust battery module designed for demanding conditions, complete with underbody protection and an advanced cooling system, while adaptive control algorithms enhance battery management based on driver behavior. Rivian plans to offer three battery sizes, including 180 kWh and 135 kWh options.
